description.p: This collection of LADSPA, DSSI, LV2 and VST plugins contains:

ul.li: Mini-Series: 3-Band EQ, 3-Band splitter, Ping Pong Pan (LADSPA, LV2 and VST).
Max-Gen samples: MaBitcrush, MaFreeverb, MaGigaverb, MaPitchshift (LADSPA, LV2 and VST).
MVerb: Studio quality reverb (LADSPA, LV2 and VST).
ndc-Plugs: Amplitude Imposer, Cycle Shifter, Soul Force (LADSPA, LV2 and VST).
Nekobi: simple single-oscillator synth based on Roland TB-303 (DSSI, LV2 and VST).
Kars: Simple karplus-strong plucked string synth (DSSI, LV2 and VST).
glBars: An OpenGL bars visualization plugin (LV2 and VST).
ProM: An awesome music visualizer (LV2 and VST).
